Defense.help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks.
Defense.targetHelp: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.
Defense.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Defense with good {PowerName}.

Assault.help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.targetHelp: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are partially resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactics.help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. Purchasing Tactics requires the user to be level 14 and possess Maneuvers or Assault.
Tactics.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactics.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactics.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactics.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Vengeance.help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. You must be at least level 14 and have two other Leadership Powers before selecting Vengeance. This power does not stack with multiple castings. Recharge: Very Long
Vengeance.targetHelp: You have been inspired to Vengeance by a natural leader. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to melee, ranged, smashing and lethal attacks are all increased and you are resistant to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback.
Vengeance.victimHit: Your fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Heal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Heal damage.

Victory_Rush.help: The defeat of an opponent gives your team a rush of adrenaline. The excitement of your victory increases the recovery and reduces the endurance cost of your powers. This effect extends to your teammates as well. The total strength of this bonus is dependent upon the rank of the enemy on which this is cast, with Archvillains and Giant Monsters providing the greatest benefit. This power does not stack with multiple castings. You must be level 14 and have trained at least two other Leadership powers before you can train Victory Rush. This power's Recharge Time cannot be reduced. Recharge: Very Long
